interesting_fact: Japan is known for its cherry blossom trees and advanced technology.
India is the largest democracy in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest.
Germany is famous for its engineering and automotive industry.
Australia is known for its unique wildlife and the Great Barrier Reef.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
Egypt is home to the ancient pyramids, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
France is famous for its art, fashion, and gastronomy.
South Africa has three capital cities and is known as the Rainbow Nation.
